data.text: @drewburrett It's definitely not going anywhere soon and I'm saying this as I currently have covid. When I get to return to work I'll be keeping my mask on for the time being.
@drewburrett I kept mine on too for similar reasons but also partly in solidarity with the children who wanted to keep theirs on too.❤️
@drewburrett I’m looking forward to taking it off when standing at the board but think I will be putting it back on as I move around close to the kids
@drewburrett Same in my classes. I was impressed.
@mrdissent @drewburrett Your da has a better social life than me 😂
@drewburrett Dad went to a wee pub band concert.....half the band, him and his cousin afflicted...this aint over.
